name: Mind Escape (Maru031)
description:
[Mind Escape]

A simple console-based quiz game where you find symbols for the equations asked.

Extract the symbols within the text and write down the answer, simple!

The narrator will guide you and give you unconditional support throughout the game.

Beware though! If you mess up a certain amount of time in each level, you might trigger them!

(Note: Please wait until all the texts are loaded before entering any input. Thank you!)
